title: Can we change how Morde's Shield gain is working the same way Swain's R does?
body:
The prime problem with Mordekaiser's passive is that it scales DIRECTLY on damage output, making stacking magic resist against him highly effective but also making him somewhat feast or famine due to his reliance on shield gain to actually survive.
Changing how his shield gain works to a flat amount rather than the actual damage dealt like they did with Swain during the mage update would help make it a lot less unhealthy in terms of feast and famine and flattening the curve between fed Morde's shield gains and those of him when behind.

Because one of Morde's biggest shortcomings right now is his lack of solid fallback pattern since his entire tankiness is bound to his damage output.

Just a quick shower thought though.

Still, riot has already stated that tankiness tied directly to damage output is something rather tricky to balance, hence they changed how Swain's R functions

If there was an AP bruiser item with % magic defense shred, similar to black cleaver it wouldn't be as big of a deal. It would normalize Mordekaiser's damage output (along with his tankiness), rather than his success being contingent on the enemy team not building magic resist. Right now when the enemy stacks magic resist, mordekaiser's only option is void staff. The seems pretty unfair, considering ad bruisers like darius or renekton aren't forced to build a full offense item like last whisper when the enemies stack armor.

If I remember correctly they tried an item like that when abyssal scepter was getting reworked.  It gave something like 5% shred stacking 5 times with an aoe burn.  It never made it off pbe so I imagine a fair few champions could abuse the shit out of it.

Yeah, black cleaver was also insanely broken on certain champs when it initially got reworked to have % armor shredding.
Namely:
{{champion:91}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3071}} 

It took a few patches, but now black cleaver is a versatile item that allows a lot of ad bruisers to be viable vs armor stacking teams.

An AP black cleaver would definitely require some re-balancing if it was implemented, but it would allow ap bruisers to have a viable build path that isn't completely shut down by magic resist stacking.

Considering how differently AD and AP items and champs are from each other I'd wager that we wont have anything close to Black Cleaver for ability bruisers.  Witts End and Abyssal Scepter are the best we will have until Riot makes a new champ to break the mold for AP or rework the entire idea of AP in a preseason.  Who knows though, we might get lucky and see an armor item give something like 15% magic pen
